name: Killbug (itch)
description:
Killbug is a shoot em up game where you play as a miniaturized ship inside a human body to fight micro-organisms (or bugs), cancer level and drepression level.

We recommand playing with a controller.

Get bonuses :

Chimio : kill all visible enemies Mitosis : triple shoot for 5 seconds Blood donation : health up Vaccine : shield for 5 second

Avoid malus :

Alzheimer : you cannot go up/down for 5 seconds

Credits

  • Adrien Guillement - Developer
  • Laurent Chauvet - Designer
  • Kurokuza - Developer
